name: UpdateAzureConfigStatus
description:
Update status of Azure config to active or archived.

This tool updates the status of a specified Azure configuration to either active or archived. It should be called when there is a need to change the operational state of an Azure config.

parameters.name: cloud_account_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the Azure Cloud account whose configuration status is being updated.

parameters.name: azure_config_patch_request_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of Azure config Patch Request, typically 'azure_uc_config_patch_request'.

value_schema.description: Type of Azure config Patch Request.

parameters.name: enable_cloud_cost_management
parameters.description: Set to true to enable the Cloud Cost Management account, false to disable it.

value_schema.description: Whether or not the Cloud Cost Management account is enabled.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.is_enabled
parameters.description: Whether or not the Cloud Cost Management account is enabled.

value_schema.description: Whether or not the Cloud Cost Management account is enabled.

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: Type of Azure config Patch Request.

value_schema.description: Type of Azure config Patch Request.
